paper_abstract: In this work, the mathematical modeling of unsteady second grade fluid in a wire coating process inside a straight annular die is developed in the form of a partial differential equation with non-homogenous boundary conditions. An exact solution is obtained for the governing equation by using the method of separation of variables. Crown Copyright (C) 2012 Published by Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Exact solution of a differential equation arising in the wire coating analysis of an unsteady second grade fluid
